languages.text: Вооруженные огнеметами солдаты планетарного гарнизона взялись за методичное выжигание островных лесов. Лишенные укрытий боевики скопились в своих лагерях и заняли оборону, предчувствуя скорую погибель.

traits.locale_text: Вооруженные огнеметами солдаты планетарной обороны взялись за методичное выжигание островных лесов. Лишенные укрытий боевики скопились в своих лагерях и заняли оборону, предчувствуя скорую погибель.

languages.text: Armed with flamers, the soldiers of the planetary garrison began methodically burning the island forests. With no cover left to conceal them, the rebels gathered in their camps and manned the defences, sensing their imminent death.
languages.original_text: Вооруженные огнеметами солдаты планетарного гарнизона взялись за методичное выжигание островных лесов. Лишенные укрытий боевики скопились в своих лагерях и заняли оборону, предчувствуя скорую погибель.

traits.locale_text: Armed with flamethrowers, the soldiers of the planetary defense forces began methodically burning the island forests. With no cover left to conceal them, the rebels gathered in their camps and manned the defenses, sensing their imminent death.

Armed with flamethrowers, the soldiers of the planetary defense forces began methodically burning the island forests. With no cover left to conceal them, the rebels gathered in their camps and manned the defenses, sensing their imminent death.

Armed with flamethrowers, the soldiers of the planetary defense forces began methodically burning the island forests. With no cover left to conceal them, the rebels gathered in their camps and manned the defenses, sensing their imminent death.

Armed with flamethrowers, the soldiers of the planetary garrison began methodically burning the island forests. With no cover left to conceal them, the rebels gathered in their camps and manned the defences, sensing their imminent death.

Armed with flamethrowers, the soldiers of the planetary garrison began methodically burning the island forests. With no cover left to conceal them, the rebels gathered in their camps and manned the defences, sensing their imminent death.

languages.text: フレイマーを装備した惑星守備隊の兵士は入念に島の森を焼き始めた。隠れ場所を失った反乱軍はキャンプに集まり、自身の死が間近に迫っていることを感じながら防衛に当たった。
languages.original_text: Armed with flamers, the soldiers of the planetary garrison began methodically burning the island forests. With no cover left to conceal them, the rebels gathered in their camps and manned the defences, sensing their imminent death.

traits.locale_text: フレイマーを装備した惑星守備隊の兵士は入念に島の森を焼き始めた。隠れ場所を失った反乱軍はキャンプに集まり、自身の死が間近に迫っていることを感じながら防衛に当たった。

languages.text: 行星驻军士兵手持火焰喷射器，开始有条不紊地焚烧岛上的森林。失去了掩体之后，叛乱分子只能聚集在营地里，依托防御工事防守，呼吸着即将到来的死亡气息。
languages.original_text: Armed with flamers, the soldiers of the planetary garrison began methodically burning the island forests. With no cover left to conceal them, the rebels gathered in their camps and manned the defences, sensing their imminent death.

traits.locale_text: 行星驻军士兵手持火焰喷射器，开始有条不紊地焚烧岛上的森林。失去了掩体之后，叛乱分子只能聚集在营地里，依托防御工事防守，呼吸着即将到来的死亡气息。

languages.text: Pertrechados con lanzallamas, los soldados de la guarnición planetaria comenzaron a incendiar sistemáticamente los bosques de la isla. Privados de un lugar en el que ocultarse, los rebeldes se atrincheraron en sus campamentos y ocuparon puestos defensivos, presintiendo que la hora de su muerte estaba próxima.
languages.original_text: Armed with flamers, the soldiers of the planetary garrison began methodically burning the island forests. With no cover left to conceal them, the rebels gathered in their camps and manned the defences, sensing their imminent death.

traits.locale_text: Pertrechados con lanzallamas, los soldados de la guarnición planetaria comenzaron a incendiar sistemáticamente los bosques de la isla. Privados de un lugar en el que ocultarse, los rebeldes se atrincheraron en sus campamentos y ocuparon puestos defensivos, presintiendo que la hora de su muerte estaba próxima.

languages.text: Mit Flammenwerfern bewaffnet, brannten die Soldaten der Garnison des Planeten die Inselwälder systematisch nieder. Als die Rebellen keine Deckung mehr hatten, versammelten sie sich in ihren Lagern, bemannten ihre Verteidigungsstellungen und warteten auf den baldigen Tod.
languages.original_text: Armed with flamers, the soldiers of the planetary garrison began methodically burning the island forests. With no cover left to conceal them, the rebels gathered in their camps and manned the defences, sensing their imminent death.

traits.locale_text: Mit Flammenwerfern bewaffnet, brannten die Soldaten der Garnison des Planeten die Inselwälder systematisch nieder. Als die Rebellen keine Deckung mehr hatten, versammelten sie sich in ihren Lagern, bemannten ihre Verteidigungsstellungen und warteten auf den baldigen Tod.

languages.text: Armés de lance-flammes, les soldats de la garnison planétaire entamèrent une destruction par le feu méthodique des forêts insulaires. N'ayant nulle part où se cacher, les rebelles se réfugièrent dans leurs camps, dont ils assurèrent la défense en se préparant à une mort imminente.
languages.original_text: Armed with flamers, the soldiers of the planetary garrison began methodically burning the island forests. With no cover left to conceal them, the rebels gathered in their camps and manned the defences, sensing their imminent death.

traits.locale_text: Armés de lance-flammes, les soldats de la garnison planétaire entamèrent une destruction par le feu méthodique des forêts insulaires. N'ayant nulle part où se cacher, les rebelles se réfugièrent dans leurs camps, dont ils assurèrent la défense en se préparant à une mort imminente.

languages.text: Alevsaçan kuşanmış gezegen garnizonu askerleri, ada ormanlarını sistemli olarak yakmaya başladı. Artık saklanacak delik bulamayan isyancılar, kaçınılmaz ölümün uzakta olmadığını idrak ederek kamplara toplandı ve savunmalarını sıklaştırdı.
languages.original_text: Armed with flamers, the soldiers of the planetary garrison began methodically burning the island forests. With no cover left to conceal them, the rebels gathered in their camps and manned the defences, sensing their imminent death.

traits.locale_text: Alevsaçan kuşanmış gezegen garnizonu askerleri, ada ormanlarını sistemli olarak yakmaya başladı. Artık saklanacak delik bulamayan isyancılar, kaçınılmaz ölümün uzakta olmadığını idrak ederek kamplara toplandı ve savunmalarını sıklaştırdı.
